Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Diva \Di"va\ (d[=e]"v[.a]), n.; It. pl. {Dive} (d[=e]"v[=a]). [It., prop. fem. of divo divine, L. divus.] A prima donna. [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
diva n : a distinguished female operatic singer; a female operatic star [syn: {prima donna}] [also: {dive} (pl)]
